import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; function EditUser(props) { const [id, setId] = useState(""); const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [secondName, setSecondName] = useState(""); const [age, setAge] = useState(18); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const [phoneNumber, setPhoneNumber] = useState(""); const [country, setCountry] = useState(""); const [city, setCity] = useState(""); const [street, setStreet] = useState(""); const [houseNumber, setHouseNumber] = useState(""); const [isPrivate, setIsPrivate] = useState(""); const [appartmentsNumber, setAppartmentsNumber] = useState("0"); const [roleID, setRoleID] = useState(1); useEffect(() => { setId(props.id); setName(props.name); }, []) function sendValues() { let body = { id: id, name: name, secondName: secondName, age: parseInt(age), email: email, password: password, phoneNumber: phoneNumber, roleID: parseInt(roleID), country: country, city: city, street: street, houseNumber: houseNumber, isPrivateHouse: isPrivate, appartmentsNumber: parseInt(appartmentsNumber) } props.saveHandler(body); } return (
setName(event.target.value)} />
setSecondName(event.target.value)} />
setAge(event.target.value)} />
setEmail(event.target.value)} />
setPassword(event.target.value)} />
setPhoneNumber(event.target.value)} />
setCountry(event.target.value)} reguired />
setCity(event.target.value)} reguired />
setStreet(event.target.value)} reguired />
setHouseNumber(event.target.value)} reguired />
setIsPrivate(event.target.checked)} />
setAppartmentsNumber(event.target.value)} />
); } export default EditUser;
